I know we'll be gone a while,
but make sure to eat properly,
okay dear?

We've just arrived at the
airport.

I can't remember the last time
I went on a trip with your
father...

We'll be sure to bring you
back some souvenirs, so look
forward to it.

And we've left you some money
to cover any expenses,
so don't go wasting it.

If you have any trouble,
you can always talk to
the neighbors, okay?

And don't forget to lock up
when you leave the house!
Hey! Is this {NAME2}-kun?
It's Motoha!
Yup!|Wrong number.
Great!
Haha. Hilarious.
You're goofier than I thought.
Right, so...

I may have found a shop that
looks super useful to help us
infiltrate the palace.

Do you have time tomorrow
after school?
I'm free.|Let me check my schedule.
Great! Thanks!
Thanks.
So tomorrow after school.
At Central Street, 'kay?

Are you okay? The house
doesn't feel too empty,
does it?
I'm doing fine.|It really doesn't.

By the way, feel free to use
whatever's in the fridge if
you feel like cooking.

By the way, feel free to use
whatever's in the fridge if
you feel like cooking.

And remember to water the
plants outside.

The thought just popped
into my head, so I thought
I'd let you know. Take care!

Good morning! It's morning
there, isn't it?
How are you doing?

I'm just a bit worried about
you since we won't be back for
a while.

Make sure you're eating
enough, okay?
Thanks, Mom.|Don't worry, I'm fine.
How's it going?

I just dropped Tomoko off
at home.
Finished up at the clinic.|We got some medicine.
Oh! Guess it went well then.

Now we can finally start
searching for the next Palace,
right?

I'm good to go whenever,
so hit me up when you wanna
search Mementos!

Hey Leader, I got a favor to
ask you.

I'll be waiting in the
classroom, so be sure
to come, okay?

Made a group chat so we can
get in touch easily!
Great, thanks!

Oh btw, I forgot to ask
earlier, but...

When's Miyazawa's change of
heart supposed to happen?
Shouldn't take too long.|Probably tomorrow?

I think so too. Kiuchi changed
a lot faster than we expected.

Really? That makes me feel
better.

All right, I'm goin' to
bed then.

Wait, what about your
homework?
I did what I could.
'Night, guys.
He definitely didn't do it.

Welp, I'm off to bed too then.
'Night!
Good night.|Great work today, everyone.
I heard from Masa-san.

A message came through
Miyazawa's manager apologizing
to Victory Kitchen.

And the rights to the shop
were returned to Pops.
We did it!|So the change of heart worked.
Yeah.

But I can't relax till I hear
it straight from the horse's
mouth.

Apparently he's holding an
emergency press conference
this afternoon.
Sorry I'm late!

Tomoko just told me
the same thing.

Do you guys wanna watch the
press conference together at
lunch?

Okay. See you guys on
the roof.

Where are you now? Did you
talk to Kano-kun?

Can you come back to the
classroom? There's something
you should see.
On my way.|See you there.
Cool. Try to hurry, okay?

I added Riko-senpai to our
chat group!
Thanks, Motoha.
How ya feelin', Senpai?

Thank you for asking. I got
home safe and I'm about to
turn in.
Shoot! Did we wake you up?
Good night! Sleep tight!
It's fine, really!

But I'll take your suggestion
and look forward to continuing
our chat tomorrow.

Sleep well, everyone.
See you at school.
Good night.
Good night.|See you tomorrow.
Thanks! Night!
Nighty night!

You two free tonight?
Wanna hit up Pops's shop?

Heritage Kitchen?
In Zoshigaya?

Yeah. Pops is doin' a lot
better lately.
So he opened the shop back up.
I heard.|He offered me a job.
What!?

Why didn't you say somethin'?
I only just found out!

Well, {NAME2}'s house is
close to the shop.
Oh right. That makes sense.

Well, Masa-san's stoppin' by
tonight to celebrate Pops's
recovery.

So we'll get to eat both
Pops's and Masa-san's ramen.
Wanna go?
YES!

That was fast!
What about you, {NAME2}?
Of course I'll go.|Can Lufel come too?

That settles it! We'll meet at
Heritage Kitchen tonight!

If we rent the place out,
Lufel can finally eat his
roast pork and stewed eggs.

Ah, if we rent it out,
pets might be okay.

Let's ask Yamagoshi-san.
Maybe this time Lufel can eat
roast pork and stewed eggs.

Okay. See you guys tonight at
Heritage Kitchen then!

Did you see what's on
Divine Justice?
Yeah! What the heck was that?

I was wondering what
Magatsushin would post,
but this...

I'm not so worried about
grades that I'd try to pay my
way out.

Yeah, you took the words right
out of my mouth!

But even if it's a lie, it
still bothers me.

It's slander, and it's taking
a real toll...

Perhaps that is a way of
stealing desires...
It definitely is.|Even indirectly...

Are they just posting whatever
they want to try to wear me
down?
Akashi is unbelievable...

Anyways, I've been called to
the faculty office. I need to
go now.
Good luck! And stay safe!

Hey, uhh...
are you busy lately?

Since I decided to become a
Phantom Thief, I've been doing
some thinking...

and I figured that I really
need to keep in shape.

So I've decided to get back
into exercising.

I mean, I could barely even
move when we were in the
Metaverse!
It was honestly pathetic...

But I know that if I exercise
by myself, I'm probably gonna
slack off.

So if you have the time,
do you think you could be
my workout buddy?
Please!

Are you ready to enter
Mementos?
Ready when you are.
I'm all set.
Greetings.

Do you think I could borrow a
moment of your time?

You see, I'm rather curious
about these Ferris Wheels.

Would you care to ride
one with me, at your next
convenience?
By all means.|I'm curious about them, too.

I am pleased to hear that.
I shall be waiting for you.

I happened to see a girl
playing the guitar on
the streets of Shibuya.

I believe she more than has
the potential to become an
idol.
You a talent scout now?|I'd like to see her play.

I suppose I have something of
an eye for talent.

Then I wish for you to
accompany me next time.

I would like to wish you a
happy birthday.
Thanks.|I appreciate it.
You are most welcome.

I see that you have grown even
stronger.
I sure have.|But things are getting tough.

Might I suggest taking on some
tougher Trials from the Sea of
Souls?
Hey, you busy?

A new ramen place opened up
near school.

And they're running this
opening promo.

You wanna go check it out
with me?
You bet I do.|Yeah, I'm kinda curious.

Great. Then let's plan a day
to go sometime!

Math class is so hard.
None of it's making any sense
to me.
How am I gonna cope...?
I'll teach you.|I'm terrible at math, too.
Really? You're a lifesaver!

Well, I'm glad I'm not the
only one...
Hey, happy birthday!
Appreciate it.|Thanks!
Hope you have a great day!

Wow, you've gotten pretty
strong, huh?
You know it.|Doesn't mean things are easy.

How about hitting the batting
cages after school?

Think you could come along
with me today...?
You wanna go there now?

I promise to have your back...
so be sure to give it your
all.

There's something I wanted to
ask you about. Do you have
some time to spare?

Hey, I wanna talk to you about
something...

Just let me know when you have
the time.

{NAME2}, you take the train
to school, right?

How do you usually pass
the time?
On my phone.|Thinking about life.

Oh, I see. Same here,
actually.
Do you do anything else?
Something like... working out?

Hey, did you see the news on
TV just now?
I saw us in an interview!
But we're Phantom Thieves?|We got interviewed?

For a split second, we crossed
behind the person getting
interviewed!

To think that our faces would
end up on live TV! What a
great find.

There was this really cool guy
when I was out running this
morning.

He's a one-hundred-year-old
grandpa who lives in the
neighborhood.

He told me he's been running
every morning for ninety
years!
Amazing.|Sounds like a great goal.

I know, right? I can't let
myself lose to some gramps!

I wanted to watch an action
movie, so I subscribed to a
streaming service.

But almost all the films
I wanted to watch aren't
available there anymore.

Do you have any
recommendations
for a good movie?
Romance.|You should try horror.

Huh, I had no idea you watched
romance flicks, {NAME2}.

I've never been into them.
Maybe I should give them
a chance.

Horror? I kinda hate jump
scares...

But I guess if I'm gonna be a
Phantom Thief, I'll need some
gall.

I'll consider it as training
my mental fortitude.

Thanks again! I'll get back to
you when I'm done watching.

Why are fries so freaking
good?
That's random.|What're you talking about?

Since I've been training a lot
lately...

I've been looking up the
amount of calories in
different foods.

French fries have waaay too
many. It made me so sad.
Are they your favorite?|Just burn it off.

If a menu's got fries, they'll
always end up on my tray.

I need to work on my
self-restraint.

I see... All I gotta do is
just exercise more to
compensate?

Work hard, eat hard!
Two birds with one stone!
Last week's math homework

You know, those ten pages in
the workbook?

That's due the day after
tomorrow, right?
Uh, it's due tomorrow.|Bad news...
Aaaaahhhhh!!! I knew it! Nooo!

That means you finished it,
right, {NAME2}?

Please, I'm begging you.
Let me copy your homework!
I'll give you some pointers.|I'll show you how to do them.
Yaaay!

Yeah, a few hints and I should
be able to do the rest on my
own.

{NAME2}, my savior!
I'm under your tutelage!

I'm super grateful.
I'll thank you properly later!

I haven't been able to sleep
well lately.

Got any ideas on how to
improve your sleep quality?
Warming up your feet helps.|Try eating dinner early.

Really? I didn't know that!
I'll give that a go tonight.

You give good advice on more
than just training.

I'm really glad you're my
coach, {NAME2}.

It's high time I stepped up to
your expectations!
Don't overdo it.|Hey, take it easy.

Don't worry about me,
I've got this.

I'm gonna give it my all
tomorrow too! Talk soon!

Uh oh, I think I'm gonna be
late for school.
Have trouble sleeping?|Are you feeling sick?

Nope, train was just late.
Just my luck lol.
Actually slept like a log.

{NAME2}, remember the
sleeping tip you gave me?

It's been working great.
My sleep's never been better!

Didn't mean to get you all
worried.
Just get a late train slip.|Train's fault, so you're safe.

You're totally right!
What am I worrying for?

My head's been in the clouds
lately. I need to get it
together.

I ran past the baseball team
during my run today.

If I hadn't quit the team,
that could've been me
practicing in the field.
You miss baseball?|You regret quitting?
Hmm... I wouldn't say that.
I wouldn't say regret.

I get the feels when I recall
all the fun times I had while
playing baseball.
And also...

I need to throw my weight into
being a Phantom Thief.

It's like we're living our
best lives every day!

On that note, see you
tomorrow!
Hey, I know this is sudden...
What does it mean to "admire"?
That is really sudden.|Did something happen?

I feel like I generate a lot
of power when I admire
someone.

I've always been the kind of
person to want to stand next
to the one I admire.

I don't know where this power
comes from, and I never really
thought about it until now.

It seemed kinda mystical once
I started thinking about it.
Is there someone you admire?|That's what "admire" means.
Umm, that's top secret.

The reason I can strive so
hard now is because of the
person I admire.

Huh? What do you mean that's
what it means?

Oh, I guess I answered my own
question already, huh?

{NAME2},
you really are amazing.

Thanks for everything! Let's
give it our all tomorrow, too!
{NAME2}!
What do you think about me!?
You're a funny one.|Love you, sweetie.
Excuse me!?
Wh-What in the world?
I'm being serious!

Tomoko said I'm still like a
kid sometimes.

I need you to tell me that it
isn't true, {NAME2}.

Is she talking about how I get
riled up like this?
Is that being childish!?
Sorry about the joke.|My bad.
Wait, don't just apologize!

That only supports her
argument that I'm childish!

I thought I knew what people
thought of me.
But I was wrong.

You and Tomoko know me better
than I know myself.
It's like that for everyone.|Act the way you wanna be seen.

Do you feel that way too,
{NAME2}?

Hearing that makes me feel a
little better.
I get that, but...

There's a huge difference with
how others see me and how I
see myself.

Ugh, complaining to you
doesn't get me anywhere.

I guess I gotta put in the
effort if I wanna become the
person I view myself to be.

I can't seem to remember
anything we learn at school.

But I can still remember all
the rules in baseball.
How did you learn them?|That's 'cause it's your hobby.

Hmmm, come to think of it...
it's more like the rules are
ingrained in my body.

For school, I have to squeeze
all the information into my
brain.

But when it comes to baseball,
I guess they're infused with
my muscle memory?

You're probably right.
It's easier to remember
what you like.

I can't recall important dates
in history, but I'll never
forget a friend's birthday.

Plus, I'd be at a disadvantage
if I didn't know the rules of
baseball.

Maybe schoolwork is the
same then?

If I just change my attitude,
then maybe everything will
start sticking in my head?

I'm gonna try a few
strategies out.

About today's modern lit
homework...

What did you put for your
answer to the last question?
I haven't done it yet.|What was the question?

"What kind of person do you
want to be in the future?"
"Answer in 50 words or less."

There's no way I can sum up
a major life question in
50 words or less.
You take things so seriously.|Focus on the biggest thing.

It's harder for me to just
wing it and not give a damn.

But this may be the very
answer to the type of person
I want to become.

The biggest thing about the
type of person I want to be...

The type to protect and defend
what I believe in?

I feel like I can write this
now. Thanks, {NAME2}.

Hey, remember when I asked you
for film recommendations on
that streaming platform?
Yeah.|How'd it go?

I was so captivated!
It was really good!

Didn't realize the story was
so sad. I straight up cried at
the end.

I thought our work as Phantom
Thieves would've made me more
resilient to this kinda stuff.

Looks like I still have a ways
to go.
Nothing wrong with crying.|Let's get stronger together.

I feel refreshed now that I've
let it all out.

Awesome. I'm always ready for
some coaching!

Let me know your other movie
recs too. We can catch a flick
on the big screen next time.
And that's a promise!

There's a new movie out on the
streaming service I signed
up to.
It looks super interesting.
I'm listening.|What sort of movie is it?

It's like a nonstop punch to
the feels.

The reviews say you'll be
caught in an endless cycle
of tears and laughter.
Can't even imagine.|Great for emotional training.

Yeah, me neither. How do you
go from laughing to crying so
quickly?

Yeah, I heard that movie
takes you on an emotional
roller-coaster.

If I'm going to be a Phantom
Thief...

I need to have full control
over my emotions. Is that
called a poker face?

Anyway, I'm going to put the
show on now.

Lemme know when you've
finished watching it,
{NAME2}.

We should have an emotional
endurance contest to see who
can last the longest!

When everyone was on break
today...

Someone outside the classroom
randomly yelled...
"Cream Soda!"
Why?|Who?

No idea. I just heard someone
yell it out.
But because of that...

All I can think about today is
cream soda.

I haven't been able to learn a
single thing in class all day
because of it.
Soda's got you trapped.|Wanna dash to a diner?

Oh no... I was trapped in an
endless cream soda mind loop!

Nngh... I need to pull myself
together.

Yeah! I'm actually heading to
one right now.

Time to enjoy a nice, ice-cold
cream soda!

Thanks for always listening to
my randomness.

Did you hear what everyone was
talking about in class today?
No, I didn't.|What were they talking about?

They were talking about dating
your best friend.

Those people just love talking
about dating, you know.

Everyone had something to say
about whether they'd give up
or give in.

Then it was my turn to answer,
but I didn't know what to say.

{NAME2}, would you date your
best friend?
Nope.|I'd go for it.|Not sure.

I see... You're a good friend
with a kind heart, {NAME2}.

I expect no less from a leader
like you! Once you lock on,
you never lose your target!

Fair enough. For some reason,
that makes me glad.

Sorry for the weird question!
See ya tomorrow!
Hey, you free now?
Was hoping to ask you a favor.
Sure.|Let me think about it.
Awesome! Let's meet somewhere.

Oh, okay.
Maybe some other time.

Didn't mean to put you on the
spot, sorry. Let me know when
you're free.

Did you see the commercial for
the new films that were just
added to that streaming site?

A bunch of them seem like
they'd totally be your thing!

If you've got time later on,
let's discuss which ones to
check out!
I'm down.|I need to check my schedule.

Great! Well, you know where to
find me!

No problem. I'll be at my
usual spot if you're free.

Right, you must be pretty
busy. No rush, just let me
know when you have time.

Are you making proper use of
the Phantom Idols?

Though they may be products
of cognition, they possess the
strength of a Phantom Thief.

Your leadership will decide
whether they succeed or fail.
I'll keep that in mind.|They are reliable allies.

Well then, it seems my support
has been worthwhile.

Please use the Phantom Idols
to their fullest potential.
Are you interested in idols?
I am.|Not really.

From what I have observed,
you share many traits.

Much like an object of
worship, an idol embodies the
desires of their believers.

I have seen that same
potential in you.
Squee!
What do you mean?|Squee!

I have discovered a magic
spell that charms people.

As such, this charm has the
potential to raise desire.
Please recite along.
Squee!|SQUEE!!!

I appear to be unaffected...
The inner workings of such a
spell remain a mystery to me.

Still, I have full confidence
that your skill is not to
blame.

Next time, I would like you to
reattempt the spell with the
pose for me.

I have utmost faith in your
capabilities.

Since our visit to Akihabara,
I have looked into "concept
cafés."

The girl named Narumi referred
to her establishment as an
"idol con café."

In other words, she is an
employee there.
She's not the real deal?|Does that count as an idol?

I could sense a strong
conviction within her.

At the very least, she has the
qualities I seek in an idol.

Whether or not she is one
makes little to no difference.
If you say so.|She was cute.

I appreciate your
understanding.

To further our contract,
please learn to be more
like her.

According to my research on
idol photo shoots...

There is much depth to taking
a photo with your idol.

How you greet her beforehand
is of vital importance.
Really?|I don't get it.

Your current mindset worries
me terribly.

You are meant to be like an
idol, much like I am a fan.

As the leader of the Phantom
Thieves, you must connect with
your allies and build trust.

I highly recommend you follow
Naruru's example.
You have a point.|Sounds like work...

Such a task is elementary for
you. Be diligent.

After our photo shoot the
other day...

I believe you've begun to
understand Naruru's charm.
I wouldn't go that far...|Almost a full-fledged fan!

Take it slow and steady. That
is what is most important.

Our contract is proceeding
smoothly.

I hear there is a saying:
"What one likes, one does
well."

Support Naruru further,
and our contract will proceed
swimmingly.
Is that how it works?|You just want to convert me.

For now, I shall welcome you
as a fellow fan.

I can educate you on Naruru's
charm another time.

Are you familiar with
live-action hero shows?

It seems many idols appear in
them before rising to fame.
This again...?|I wouldn't know.

I came across such a show
while strolling Akihabara.

The performers hid their
faces, so I could not tell who
they were.

What exactly makes someone a
live-action hero?
Their names end with -man.|They're called Rangers.

I admit I am not familiar with
such names.

This clearly requires further
investigation.

I will also have to look into
these "live-action effects."

I have researched the duties
of a producer.

They act as an idol's mentor
and key partner.

In other words, the fate of an
idol's career depends on them.

A corrupt producer can ruin
even the most talented idol.
He's going down.|Let's save Naruru.

With your help, I have no
doubt this issue will be
resolved.

It will take some time for
his change of heart to be
reflected in reality...

Until then, I can only
continue to support Naruru
as a fan.

It is times like these when
one's loyalty is tested.

For now, it is vital that I
"like" Naruru's posts on the
café's social media.

The other day, I happened to
see Naruru.

She wore not her con café
attire. Instead, it was a
convenience store uniform.
Did you say hi?|So she's working there?

I knew it wasn't the time
or place to approach her.

After all, I've learned
private inquiries are taboo.

After all, I've learned
private inquiries are taboo.

As such, I shall not even
share details of
the store's location.
That's the right thing to do.|You're a model fan.
I only did what any fan would.

All I can do now is pray for
Naruru to find peace.

Do you recall our discussion
about live-action heroes?

My research has led me to
a popular title called
Phoenix Ranger Featherman.

Live action is a door to
success for many hopeful
actors and idols.

Soon enough, Naruru will
join their ranks...

I should investigate
live-action heroes further.
What a cultured woman you are.|How far will you go?

This is to better understand
you and other humans.

That is a concierge's duty.
I will persevere.

I ask for your continued
cooperation.

Phoenix Ranger Featherman
apparently has many
installments.
Which Featherman do you like?
I can't decide.|I'm not familiar with it.

I heard that live-action hero
shows are made for children.

Most seem to grow out of it
as they age.

However, some devout fans
continue to watch even
into adulthood.

I wish for you to become
an adult filled with such
a bountiful desire.
I don't know...|What about idols?

Watching a cast of young,
inexperienced actors

hone their craft over time is
a satisfying sight.

The same concept applies to
supporting one's idol.

Please give live action a try
when you have the chance.

Thank you again for your
assistance with Naruru.

Without you, we would have
